trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Cereth is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Cereth instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if she fails, provided Cereth isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of her turns, Cereth can use a bonus action to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Cereth deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Cereth that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Cereth doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Cereth makes three attacks with her shortsword or two attacks with her shortbow.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: Cereth halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The thief must be able to see the attacker.
